name: Chocolate Whiskey Sauce
description: [Photograph: Carrie Vasios] Check out other recipes from our "Simple Supper for St. Patrick's Day" menu »...

recipeInstructions.text: Melt chocolate in a double boiler. Set aside. In a medium saucepan, whisk together milk and sugar. Bring milk to a steady simmer, stirring until sugar has dissolved. Whisk in chocolate until smooth. Whisk in cream. Let mixture come to room temperature, then mix in whiskey. Pour over vanilla ice cream, if desired.
